block.p: KELLEY-Jonathan. Suddenly on June 30, 1998. Much loved riding instructor at Chelsea Piers Equestrian Center and past teacher at Clairmont Riding Academy. Beloved son of Eugene and Chetta Kelley. Loving brother of Seana Chase, Eugene Kelley, Jr., and Heather Carr. Cherished grandson of Madeline and the late Michael Solimando, and Martin and Helen Kelley. Dear uncle of Sophie, Rachel, Alexandra, Eugene, Justin and Michael. Visiting hours Thursday, 2-4 and 7-9PM at ''The Riverside'', 76 Street and Amsterdam Ave. Funeral services will be held Tuesday, July 7, in Milton, Mass.
